front.title: Server To Server Notification Protocol Requirements

abstract.t: This memo suggests a set of requirements for the implementation of a protocol in which a messaging system (e.g. email server, voice mail system, etc.) submit alerts, which describe potential notification events, regarding an end user mailbox status change (e.g. new message has arrived, mailbox is full, etc.). These alerts are sent to a notification service, which may, in turn, generate an end user alert notification.
